title: Nicole Wants To Be Amused
description:
HELLO HI HI HI THERE! This week Nicole and Sasheer talk about adult things like working on your air conditioner or washing machine, and what even is freon? Then they talk about adult things, like foot fetishes and couples who film themselves sexy for Instagram. We cover scary theme parks, how outhouses work, how GRAND the Grand Canyon is, and what kind of dinosaur everyone is in We’re Back.  They wrap things up by answering listener questions about risking a friendship to find love, and should you go to a wedding of a bad friend instead of a Lizzo concert?

 

Email or call Nicole & Sasheer with your friendship questions at:

nicoleandsasheer@gmail.com

424-645-7003
author: fanmail+bestfriends@earwolf.com (Earwolf)
